task.title: Fix sshd startup for Codex tunnel

events.content: Run workspace image as root for sshd: Run workspace image as root for sshd

raw.question: Run workspace image as root for sshd
raw.chosen: Run workspace image as root for sshd
raw.reasoning: entrypoint sshd block only runs as root; we drop to workspace via gosu so app still non-root

retrospective.summary: Set workspace image to run entrypoint as root so sshd starts for Codex tunnel
